texts.text: v0.15.9 is an update that added capes and a new Skin pack, as well as fixed bugs and crashes in v0.15.8.[1]

Version exclusive: MINECON 2016 Skin Pack, available for a limited time.
The MINECON cape skins can be worn by anyone with the MINECON skin pack, even if they did not go to MINECON.
As of October 7th, 2016, the limited time offer for the skin pack is over, it has been removed from all app stores, and its redemption code is now expired. Players who obtained it while it was available are still able to use it.
"MINECON 2016 skin pack incoming! Get 'em while they're hot!" - Mojang, September 22, 2016
